author: Editorial, Editorial
title: We need coordinated global action over animal markets to help prevent the next pandemic
description: Editorial: It has to be a worldwide effort, because if it is not then existing diseases will still be harboured, and new diseases will appear
content:
Given that some of the most terrifying diseases to stalk humanity in recent years have emerged from insanitary and unsafe live animal markets it is strange, indeed incomprehensible, that so little has been done about them.
After all, it appears likely that t… [+3648 chars]
